# ModelViewer Block

This block renders a ModelViewer component.

# Usage

To configure this block use this setting:

{
	type: 'modelviewer',
	url: 'assets/Astronaut.glb'
}
Option Description Default Values
type Define this block type (required) "modelviewer"
url The local/remote URL of the 3D model (.glb format) String
views The array of different cameraOrbit settings you want to use as steps within a scene Array

# Installation

Please read the installation istructions for official plugins here using this unique identifier: block-modelviewer

You can find the source code in its repository.
